title: Life insurance reserve certifications
dataVerified: Actuary name, insurance company, reserve amounts, mortality assumptions, actuarial opinion signature
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fraudulent reserve reports enabling insolvency fraud. Domain binding verifies credentialed actuary. State insurance regulators require actuarial certification. Multi-billion dollar policy liabilities. Policyholder protection from insurer failure. NAIC Model Audit Rule requires Actuarial Opinion of Reserves (AOR). Critical for insurance solvency regulation.
